mdRecord.dcterms:title: Medicine chest
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: J. Terry & Company [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: J. Terry & Co. Pattern 1849. Contains 15 glass medicine bottles with stoppers, some from Todd, Hinton & Taylor, Apothecaries and Druggists, Petersburg, VA; apothecary scales and weights; spatulas; and additional glass stoppers.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments or apparatus
